commenter_a: One reason I support Trump is not because he knows everything, but because I agree with his position on most things. I like his energy and desire to solve problems, and he seems to be willing to change when something isn't working..unlike most politicians who refuse to admit when they're wrong. However, (and this is an example) when Hillary says he doesn't believe in climate change, he needs to back up his position with facts on why. Sure she can say scientists believe in it..well not all of them do. Trump needs to bring up scientists that don't support that theory. Also I would like to see him release his taxes, so she can't bring it up anymore.
